A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visuals and audio top notch. But the problems make this almost unwatchable: Plot holes and logical problems everywhere; bad treatment of Luke Skywalker; boring and bland new characters; Rey has god mode; contrived plot and conveniences that break the rules of the world just to have certain cool looking scenes. This one even breaks the lore retroactively for the films before; the humor does not work for me; even the most serious situation is treated like a joke. Feels more like Spaceballs than Star Wars. This one broke Star Wars for me. Not going to see another one or buy the merch. I really wanted to like this but instead it feels like a slap in the face of the fans. The only way to salvage this would be to have Finn wake up in the medbay next episode and declare it a bad dream. I wish them good luck in fixing this mess.
